AUTHOR: FrostTheFox
INSTALL_MSG: ***Please ensure you have placed your PTC credentials in the config.json file.*** For more info, please read README.md in the CheckPTC folder of the repo.
NAME: CheckPTC
SHORT: Checks if we can login and get an access token for PoGo from PTC.
DESCRIPTION: Logs into Pokemon Trainer Club and requests a PoGo access token.
